headline: Jim Jordan Calls for Investigation Into Nancy Pelosi
author: IWB
sentences: Ohio Republican Rep. Jim Jordan says the Democrats committee investigating the incident at the U.S. Capitol last January is a “political operation” aimed at stopping Donald Trump from running for president in 2024.
“The government granted it and now the January 6 committee petitions them to ask them questions about exercising their First Amendment right to assemble,” he added.
“There’s been subpoenas issued to 11 individuals, 11 American citizens who asked the government permission on an application to hold the Trump rally,” Jordan said.

That seems obvious.”
Continuing his criticism, Jordan said that “everyone in the country sees this as a political operation.
I just think that’s — you know where I’m at on this commission — this is all about going after President Trump.

Because they don’t want him to run again.”
conservativebrief.com/mission-60657/
I didn’t do anything wrong — I talked to the president,” Jordan said.
This is designed to get after President Trump.
“I talk to the president all the time.
